title: Fort Vancouver National Historic Site: Do Business With Us
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Do Business With Us            Do Business With Us       The national park provides a number of opportunities for businesses as well as traditional park visitors. Please find below a listing of business opportunities currently available.    Requests for Expression of Interest (posted April 8, 2015)  These Requests for Expression of Interest (RFEIs) invite submissions of concepts that would renovate and re-use two historic buildings in the national park's Vancouver Barracks. These concepts will be used to guide the Requests for Proposals for the buildings' re-use. The NPS seeks re-use concepts from individuals, governmental and quasi-governmental agencies, and non-profit or for-profit organizations.   The NPS will hold two site visits: one at 10 am on April 21, 2015 and a second at 1 pm on May 7, 2015.    Parties interested in attending the site visits must RSVP to Kristen Jontos by 2:00 pm (PT) on April 20th, 2015 for the April 21st visit or May 6th, 2015 for the May 7th visit.    The NPS will provide additional information for the site visit to those who respond prior to the deadlines.Please include in your email the names of those who will attend.    The documents linked below provide more information:    East Vancouver Barracks: Building 748, Request for Expression of Interest (RFEI), Facility Re-Use East Vancouver Barracks: Building 989, Request for Expression of Interest (RFEI), Facility Re-Use
